documents.document:
JinChemical 24424-99-5

JinChemical launched its 24424-99-5 (DIBOC,BOC anhydride),which can be used in the organic synthesis to introduce amino acid protection gene. Because it must synthesize one kind of compound similar to the natural multi-peptide, also must connect each kind of optical rotation amino acid to certain length the peptide chain according to certain order, when needed to combine one kind of amino acid the carboxyl group and another kind of amino acid amino, must prevent to combine identical kind of amino acid mutually, therefore, in synthesis , it must protect certain aminos or the carboxyl group,In order to react in the way which is required to carry on.

24424-99-5 is one well capable protecting agent for amino acid , utilized specially in the amino acid amino protection, widely applied in the medicine, the protein and the multi-peptide synthesis, biochemistry food, the cosmetics and many kinds of product synthesis.In. Compared with the traditional amino acid protecting agent like chloro-carbonic acid animal pen ester, the chloro-carbonic acid - P wu formic acid, it has the following merit:
1.Competitive price
2.No intense irritant flavor, no harm to human body, but may cause skin allergy if contact the skin directly, and may strip with water.
3.Using this product to synthesize the multi-peptides, the remove condition of this protection gene is temperate, and it is easier to separate the responded product compared with using other types of amino acid protecting agent.
4.Has the ignitability, but does not belong to flammable explosive

Here are some basic information about 24424-99-5
product name Di-tert-butyl-dicarbonate
CAS NO. 24424-99-5
Molecular formula C10H18O5
Molecular weight 218.25
surface Transparent crystal
melting point 22?24?
specification 99% min.
package 50kg iron drum

For more information,please visit http://www.jinchemical.com/eng/

JinXiang Chemical enterprise takes science and technology innovates as the power of enterprise development. Since it was founded in 1995,JinXiang Chemical enterprise has bend himself to the research, exploitation and production
Of new produce constantly. There are three series of production-MedicinePesticideSensitization materials Intermediates, more than 70 productions. Nearly 20 productions has high market share at international and civil market, and our enterprise is long-term production supplier for many international famous companies.

Quality status of 24424-99-5 Di-tert-butyl dicarbonate

Di-tert-butyl dicarbonate,also named BOC anhydride, short name is DIBOC, CAS no. is 24424-99-5,which is used to introduce amino acid to protect gene in organic synthesis. Because to synthetize a kind of compound same as natural polypeptide, must take all kinds of optical rotation amino acids sequentially connected to a certain length of polypeptide chains,when combine this carboxyl with that amino between two kinds of amino acid, should prevent the same amino acid molecules combined with each other.So, when synthesis, must get certain amino or carboxyl groups protected, so that the reaction can carry out as the requirements. This product is just a kind of amino acid protective agent with good performance, especially for amino protection, widely used in medicine, protein and peptide synthesis, biochemistry food, cosmetics and other products synthesis.

At present, in the domestic market,quality difference of boc is very big. Although main content from some manufacturers can reach to 99%,the contents of impurity, solvents and heavy metals are still very high, and the quality is unstable. These quality grades generally only can be used for non medical or for the low quality requirements.
For some pharmaceutical enterprises, who have high quality requirements, the main content is at least up to 99.5%. However, the manufacturers can be numbered that purity up to 99.5%,and never use solvents prohibited by FDA,then get heavy metals or compound impurities.

In recent years,through refined research about process,repeated tests, use the solvents totally meet the USA FDA scope, Jinxiang chemical had produced high quality of 24424-99-5,which not contain isopropyl and sec-butyl group, no heavy metal impurities. 24424-99-5 from Jinxiang had been approved by the international well-known pharmaceutical companies and formed a strategic cooperation supplier.

DANYANG JINXIANG CHEMICAL FACTORY

marketing@jinchemical.com
Huangtang Town, Danyang, Jiangsu Province

Jin Chemical 2446-83-5

JinChemical launched its 2446-83-5 (Diisopropyl azodicarboxylate),which can be used for liquid blowing agent,pharmaceutical intermediates.Used for vinyl resin liquid foaming agent and be used to make light color vinyl foamed plastics. Have uniform microporous structure, with the recipe and processing conditions are different, can get shut holes or the openings foam body. Also used as medicine intermediates, organic synthetic reagent, etc.

CAS NO. 2446-83-5
product name Diisopropyl azodicarboxylate
Molecular formula C8H14N2O4
Molecular weight 202.21
surface Orange crystal or liquid
melting point 75?/0.25mmHg
specification 98% min
package 50KGS/DRUM

Production history of 24424-99-5

Jinxiang chemical is the earliest enterprise that first successfully develop the new production process of 24424-99-5(di-tert-butyl dicarbonate) in China. From small-scale production in 2001,till 2005 Jinxiang started mass production,and applied for technology invention patent in 2006 (Patent NO.: ZL2006100862992) .This process method and finished product have got highly recognition by international peers and users.
In 2008, according to some European pharmaceutical companies' requirements,Jinxiang chemical adjusted adamantane series,fluorine series,and other pharmaceutical intermediates production to the branch factory,so that only produced di-tert-butyl dicarbonate(24424-99-5) in Danyang site,which can avoid the cross contamination.It is more effective for production management,and more guaranteed for quality control.Jinxiang passed the ISO9001 quality system certification successfully in 2009 .
Advanced production technology,10years' production experiences and strict quality management system are the guarantee of high quality .So far,Jinxiang has become the largest manufacturer of 24424-99-5(Di-tert-butyl dicarbonate)with high quality goods in our local market.
JinXiang Chemical enterprise takes science and technology innovates as the power of enterprise development. Since it was founded in 1995,JinXiang Chemical enterprise has bend himself to the research, exploitation and production of new produce constantly. There are three series of production-MedicinePesticideSensitization materials Intermediates, more than 70 productions. Nearly 20 productions has high market share at international and civil market, and our enterprise is long-term production supplier for many international famous companies.

European General Agent for 24424-99-5 Di-Tert-Butyl Dicarbon

Jinxiang Chemical Factory confirms that DKSH will be their European General Agent for Diboc(CAS :24424-99-5).
In recent years, 24424-99-5 produced by Jinxiang Chemical Factory accounted for 80% share of Foreign Market. While Europe accounted for most of the market share. Jinxiang Chemical enjoys the good reputation for its high quality goods, Stable quality and none of heavy metal impurities among the Several Well-known pharmaceutical companies and many small customers.
In order to supply the quality24424-99-5 to Europe customers more quickly and more efficiently, Jinxiang Chemical determine that will set up the European Agent for DIBOC.
Jinxiang Chemical have cooperated with DKSH for several years. They have establish mutual trust and good friendship. To confirm DKSH as European Agent, which not only helps Jinxiang 24424-99-5 to get the general promotion in the European market, but also ensure the Jinxiang Diboc can be faced to European customers directly.
DKSH is primarily responsible for the 24424-99-5 comprehensive promotion and sales , after sales service in the Europe market. DKSH ship the diboc by Refrigerator container and set up the Refrigerator warehouse for dangerous goods in Hamburg. They will regularly hold 20-30mt diboc . Which helps the Europe customers to receive high quality diboc more conveniently,while the customers saves much cost of transportation and other relative charges.
For more information,you may visit http://www.jinchemical.com/eng/

The uses of 2446-83-5

Diisopropyl azodicarboxylate (2446-83-5) is used as a reagent in the production of many organic compounds. Its main use is in the Mitsunobu reaction, where it serves as an oxidant.

It is sometimes preferred to Diethyl azodicarboxylate (DEAD) because it is more hindered, and thus will not form hydrazide byproducts.

Jinxiang chemical 2446-83-5 also can be used for liquid blowing agent;pharmaceutical intermediates.Used for vinyl resin liquid foaming agent and be used to make light color vinyl foamed plastics. Have uniform microporous structure, with the recipe and processing conditions are different, can get shut holes or the openings foam body. Also used as medicine intermediates, organic synthetic reagent, etc.

Specificationsrange transparent liquid,special odor.Soluble in common plastic plasticizer, good mutual solubility.Decomposition of colorless, non-toxic, no pollution, no smell, no spray.In 40? 120 ? can obtain high volume.

2446-83-5 is one of the main products of jinxiang chemical factory. Recent years, jinxiang chemical factory had lead the products to whole market home & abroad. All of these achievements are on the basis of our good quality of products & good service pattern.

Jinxiang brand 24424-99-5 suffer commodities fleeing in the

After 10 years production and sale,Jinxiang chemical has been the largest manufacturer of di-tert-butyl dicarbonate?24424-99-5? in the world.

Jinxiang brand 24424-99-5 had mainly exported to Europe,USA,India and so on.The market share is 90% in Europe,now Jinxiang chemical designated DKSH as its Europe agent.The market share is almost 100% in USA,and is about 40% in India.Jinxiang brand di-tert-butyl dicarbonate had won the international well-known pharmaceutical companies approval,such as Novartis,Abbott and so on.

Recently,some customers reflected that middleman used Jinxiang 24424-99-5 to commodities fleeing.At the beginning,communicated with customers and data authentication,sample confirmed all supplied by Jinxiang .After customers approved the sample,the middleman purchased goods from other factories instead of Jinxiang brand.

In response to this event,the top leaders of Jinxiang chemical company have taken active measures,actively communicated with the finished users,then will make special code on the packages,and notify customers instantly.Thereby,also remind some customers to check and identify the goods at first time when received.Jinxiang technical staff remind customers to identify from product color and test results,at the same time,also can contact with international department for approval.
